name: xScope Frames File
summary: Learn about .FRAMES files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: You can save FRAMES files by choosing Frames → Save Frames As... in xScope. To load frames, choose Frames → Open Frames....

description: File created by xScope, a program used for creating user interface mockups for mobile apps; saves a collection of frames, which specify outlines areas on a user interface view; allows designers to save the sizing and placement locations of design elements.
